Sample Pages

This page explains the strcutre of sample pages.

Objects Styles

Each Object appears in the same style throughout all pages.

about cinemas

i am a cinema box
i am a auditorium box

about movies

i am a movie box
i am a movie title
i am a version box

about showtimes

i am a showtime box
i am a date box
i am a time box
